description: After meeting with Kim Jong-il, the leader of North Korea, former President Bill Clinton secured a pardon for two American journalists who had been jailed there. (Video: NBC)
title: Bill Clinton Returns With Journalists
title_page: Bill Clinton Returns With Journalists - Video - NYTimes.com
text: After meeting with Kim Jong-il, the leader of North Korea, former President Bill Clinton secured a pardon for two American journalists who had been jailed there. (Video: NBC)
